# <a name="print-email-calendars-and-attachments"></a><span data-ttu-id="87f5a-102">E-mail, agenda en bijlagen afdrukken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-102">Print email, calendars, and attachments</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="87f5a-103">Een e-mailbericht afdrukken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="87f5a-104">Selecteer het bericht dat u wilt afdrukken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="87f5a-105">Selecteer de drie puntjes in de rechterbovenhoek van het bericht en selecteer **afdrukken**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots and then select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="87f5a-106">Uw agenda afdrukken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-106">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="87f5a-107">In de rechterbovenhoek van de pagina selecteren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-107">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="87f5a-108">**Afdrukken**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-108">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="87f5a-109">Kies de weergave- en tijdbereik op en selecteer **afdrukken**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-109">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="87f5a-110">Een bijlage afdrukken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-110">To print an attachment:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="87f5a-111">Open het bericht met de bijlage die u wilt afdrukken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-111">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="87f5a-112">Plaats de cursor op de bijlage en selecteer het pictogram **downloaden**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-112">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **Download** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="87f5a-113">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-113"></span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="87f5a-114">Nadat het bestand is gedownload, met het juiste programma te openen en kies de optie om af te drukken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-114">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="87f5a-115">Bijvoorbeeld een doc-bestand openen in Word en vervolgens afdrukken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-115">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="87f5a-116">Voor meer informatie, Zie [afdrukken e-mailberichten, bijlagen en kalenders in Outlook op het web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="87f5a-116">To learn more, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span></span>
